knimeNode.name: Distance (3-D)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node calculates the distance between two points in 3-D space

intro.p: This node calculates the distance between two points in 3-D Euclidean space. The coordinates are contained in 6 numerical columns.
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
